name: The Chancellor of Hydria
description:
A text based game set in a large fantasy world. This game is an excerpt of a larger story centered around a civilization where ten supreme Elementals guard over human life. When the elementals turn on the cities they once fostered, your character, the General of the neutral city of Regethon, must travel across the land to find the solution to the mysterious corruption of the Elementals.

This story details the General's arrival at Hydria, the city erected to honor the Water Elemental, Hydrax. You must talk your way to the Chancellor of the city to convince him to aid you in your quest.
